description: A stylesheet for a classic Tic-Tac-Toe game frontend, defining colors and styles for various components and themes.

classes.name: game-controls
classes.description: Styles for the game controls, including buttons and layout.

classes.name: game-info
classes.description: Styles for displaying game information in a structured format.

classes.name: error
classes.description: Styles for displaying error messages with appropriate background and text color.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styles including layout, background, and color transitions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the main header of the application, managing its layout and color scheme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for application links, including color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for a button allowing users to toggle between light and dark themes.
